about_the_game:
CATCLICK
CATCLICK is an exciting game that combines puzzles, adventures, and lots of cute kittens. The story begins when a mother cat loses her kittens, and only you can help her find them by traveling through various locations and exploring every corner. Enjoy the process of finding and bringing the kittens home, each good kitten you find will receive unique food. The game features two modes: the relaxing Relax Mode and the more challenging Bad Cats Mode, each offering unique features and challenges.

Game Features:
Relax Mode (Standard Mode)
In Relax Mode, you can fully immerse yourself in a meditative adventure. Here, you don't need to do anything but enjoy the process of finding kittens. Explore a variety of levels filled with hidden spots and unexpected hideouts, accompanied by pleasant music that helps you relax and unwind from everyday hustle and bustle. You can save your progress at any time to continue from where you left off.

Unique Levels: 10 different levels with unique background images and kittens hidden in the most unexpected places.
Music Player: Enjoy 88 unique melodies — from relaxing and classical to rhythmic and dynamic.
Simple Controls: Easily learn and play, enjoying intuitive controls.
Beautiful Visual Effects: Bright and colorful Pictures bring each level to life.
Cool Cutscenes: Captivating animated interludes between levels that add depth to the game's storyline.
Progress Saving: You can save your progress at any time to return to the game at your convenience.
Bad Cats Mode
For those looking for a challenge, we have the Bad Cats Mode. Mutant cats have invaded Earth and are trying to take over! You must find all the bad cats before they infect the good ones and then return the good kittens to their mother to save the planet.

Increased Difficulty: Find all the bad cats and avoid their traps to successfully complete the level.
Time Limits: Keep an eye on the timer and manage your time to find all the cats before the time runs out.
Special Bonuses: Earn bonuses for finding the bad cats in the correct order and increase your chances of success.
Dynamic Gameplay: Bad Cats Mode adds dynamics and adrenaline, making the game even more exciting.
Leaderboards: The best players who complete the Bad Cats Mode with the highest score get into the leaderboard.
Additional Features:
Number of Levels: 20 levels (10 in each mode).
Unique Cats: Over 400 unique good and bad cats are waiting for you in the game.
Music Player: Enjoy 88 musical compositions for all ages.

Why Play CATCLICK:
CATCLICK is a game suitable for all ages. It offers unique levels, two exciting game modes, and lots of cute kittens to find. Enjoy beautiful visual effects, relaxing music, and intuitive controls. Help the mother cat bring back her kittens and enjoy every moment in CATCLICK!

short_description: CATCLICK is an exciting adventure game where you help a mother cat find her lost kittens. Play in Relax Mode, simply enjoying the search process with pleasant music, or choose the Bad Cats Mode where you save the world from mutant cats. Explore levels, enjoy beautiful effects, and intuitive controls
